title: PREACHING AND REACHING  THROUGH THE GOSPEL

memory_verse.label: Memory Verse
memory_verse.text: “Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.”( Mark 16 : 15 )

devotion.label: Insight / Reflection
devotion.text:
Preaching the gospel is not a choice  it is God’s command and heart beat. The Gospel carries a divine magnetic power that draws hearts toward salvation. Every preacher receives a unique anointing from God, and the primary purpose of that anointing is one the harvest of souls!

In these last days, our supreme calling is to win as many souls for Christ as we can. As the Lord commanded, the Gospel must begin in Jerusalem, move through Judea and Samaria, and reach the uttermost parts of the earth.

The Apostle Paul declared with boldness, “I have finished my race, I have kept the faith,” because his preaching reached countless souls. His Spirit-filled writings still work powerfully today. Likewise, our Lord Jesus proclaimed the Gospel, and His words continue to save millions even now.

That same Word of God has been entrusted to us  to carry light into the darkest places. Therefore, let us preach with the power of the Holy Spirit, with zeal and holiness, so that the Gospel may shine through us with signs and wonders wherever we go!

quote.label: Today's Quote
quote.text: “The world has yet to see what God can do through a man who is wholly consecrated to Him.” ( D. L. Moody )

prayer.label: Prayer
prayer.text: Lord, pour Your anointing upon my words and my life. Grant me the power to shine the light of the Gospel in places filled with darkness. May many souls be saved through my witness. Amen.

conclusion.label: A Word to You
text: May your voice carry the message of the Kingdom of Heaven,And may your words touch hearts that long for Christ.

recommended_book.label: Recommended Book
recommended_book.title: THE SOUL WINNER
recommended_book.author: CHARLES SPURGEON
recommended_book.quote: “If you want to bring others to Christ, you must first live close to Him yourself.”
